bibl.title: Papers Presented at the Eleventh International Conference on Patristic Studies Held in Oxford 1991. 2. Biblica et apocrypha, orientalia, ascetica
bibl.seg: GOEHRING James E., Melitian Monastic Organization: A Challenge to Pachomian Originality.

Elizabeth A. LIVINGSTONE (Ed.), Papers Presented at the Eleventh International Conference on Patristic Studies Held in Oxford 1991. 2. Biblica et apocrypha, orientalia, ascetica = Studia Patristica. 25 (Leuven, 1993) pp. 388-395.
